• {{item.name}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sidebar', templateUrl: './sidebar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sidebar.component.css'] }) export class SidebarComponent { selectedClass = "templates" list=[ { number:'1', name:'Request', icon:'fa-solid fa-house', link:'requests' }, { number:'2', name:'Template', icon:'fa-solid fa-house', link:'templates' }, { number:'3', name:'Dashboard', icon:'fa-solid fa-house', link:'statistics' } ] constructor(){} ngOnInit(): void { } onClassSelected(link:string){ this.selectedClass=link } }
